item.title: I need help
item.dc:creator: @Dvs_Chick Dvs Chick
item.description:
@Dvs_Chick wrote:

[quote=“chevy94, post:13, topic:242826”]oh ty hey insted of using up this forum talking you can log into my derver if you would like
ip to log in is 207.172.30.128[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 10, 2008, 08:42:20 pm[/size][hr]its numbers cuz idk how to make it like chevy-scape.no-ip.biz or something[/quote]
To get a no-ip go to www.no-ip.com
Then, register an account(very fast)
Then log in, go into Host/Redirects or something along those lines at the top(it’s a tab)
Then go to add host. Next put in the name you would want, like jenscape. Next pick the ending you want, like no-ip.org or no-ip.biz. Also, Stormcutter’s ‘How To Make A Server’ Tutorial has more in-depth instructions and pictures on how to do that. Just go into the Server Tutorial forums and it’s stickied.[quote=“xx Santa pker xX, post:14, topic:242826”][quote author=Dvs Chick link=topic=319140.msg2529341#msg2529341 date=1226371187]
::makemod and ::givemod is the same exact thing. It’s basically saving you time from making them log out, change their player rights, and telling them to log back in. The commands are the lazy way. I’ll give you the player right values if you want.
0=Regular player
1=Moderator
2=Administrator
3=Owner or Co-Owner
4=Hidden Administrator
10=Hidden Co-Owner

[/quote]

WOW. Thanks lol i didnt no 10 was hidden co owner[/quote]

Lol You’re welcome

Read full topic

item.title: I need help
item.dc:creator: @Dvs_Chick Dvs Chick
item.description:
@Dvs_Chick wrote:

Make sure when you change the player rights, your character is logged out from the server. Then go into your character file, change the player rights, X that out, SAVE your changes, then log back into the server. It should work because if it doesn’t then you’re doing it wrong. And to make people Co-Owner you just make sure they’re signed out, and change their player rights from 0 to 3.

Read full topic

item.title: I need help

item.description:
@Dvs_Chick wrote:

Just go into your character files, open up your character, and change the player rights from 0 to 3.

so is that how i also get me to sign on as coder + owner? cuz i wont to and i need to get the codes for it[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 10, 2008, 08:29:22 pm[/size][hr]sorry im new lol

item.title: I need help
item.dc:creator: @Dvs_Chick Dvs Chick
item.description:
@Dvs_Chick wrote:

I do not understand your question. Is it WHY do you sign on as owner+coder? If so, that’s because the message is set up that way when somebody with playerrights=3 logs on. It’s a simple fix. Open up your client.java. (right click and select edit) not hit ctrl+f and search for owner and coder. Scroll down until you see the words. Now delete all the text and put what you want it to say instead of that. Once you’re finished, X out, click YES to save. Compile your sever and restart it, and it should be fixed.

Read full topic
